text:
@ImranKhanPTI Have some mercy on people
Govt is doing nothing to protect people from coronavirus.
People are doing everything on their own
You know nothing
Situation at ground is dire.
Increase testing
Convince people to come to hospitals
Enforce sops
Dont fool people by chanting "all is well"
